descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Discover. A brighter future.', "With us, you’ll do meaningful work from Day 1. Our collaborative culture is built on three core behaviors: We Play to Win, We Get Better Every Day & We Succeed Together. And we mean it — we want you to grow and make a difference at one of the world's leading digital banking and payments companies. We value what makes you unique so that you have an opportunity to shine.", '', 'Come build your future, while being the reason millions of people find a brighter financial future with Discover.', '', 'At Discover, be part of a culture where diversity, teamwork and collaboration reign. Join a company that is just as employee-focused as it is on its customers and is consistently awarded for both. We’re all about people, and our employees are why Discover Be the reason we help millions of consumers build a brighter financial future and achieve yours along the way with a rewarding career.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Clinical Data Scientist', 'Remote – US Only', 'About Vivante', 'Vivante Health is an innovative startup reinventing the way chronic conditions are managed. We’re filling the unmet needs of people with chronic conditions that are invisible, neglected or stigmatized, starting with digestive disease.', 'Why digestive? Because an astonishing 70 million people in the US are affected—that’s twice the number with diabetes and more than many other chronic conditions combined. Unlike other chronic conditions, though, digestive diseases often go untreated or misdiagnosed…because of stigma.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This job is remote!', "O'Neil Global Advisors (OGA) is an investment advisor that builds algorithmic strategies based on proprietary quantitative factor research pioneered by investing legend William J. O'Neil. Bill's methodology has achieved consistent success over more than five decades, and OGA's strategies provide our clients with an exclusive way to capture the success of his powerful and disciplined approached to investing.We develop strategies that are inspired by Bill's disciplined quantitative approach and incorporate his desire for constant improvement through ongoing backtesting.", '', '', '', '', '']

['Imagine working in a place where continuous improvement and innovation is celebrated and rewarded; where fast-paced, high-impact teams come together to positively drive results for one of the largest & most iconic brands in the world.', '', 'As the only rapidly growing retailer, you may know us as your friendly neighborhood store. You probably know our familiar name, have seen our pervasive logo, and have tried our highly sought-after products, such as Slurpee® and Big Bite®. “Brain Freeze” is a 7-Eleven registered trademark for our 53-year old Slurpee® and with over 77,000 stores globally (more than any other retailer or food service provider), we sell over 14 million a month.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['ABOUT YOU', 'Are you an analytical, data-driven professional? Are you interested in a role that enables you to have a direct impact on the company’s products and services? If so, then Ancera is the place for you!', 'Join our team and help us unlock actionable insights that will enable food producers to assess microbial risk from farm to consumer, and feed billions of people around the world without worry or risk.', 'ABOUT US', "Ancera's True North is delivering new science to improve agricultural productivity.", 'Ancera is dedicated to improving the way we feed the world. We were founded with the discovery of a novel way of quickly identifying bacterial threats in the food supply and built on that vision to give farmers, veterinarians, quality managers, and corporate executives new tools to improve all phases of their operations, from farm to market.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
pros: ['"Good people, benefits, and a fun place to work" (in 1 reviews)']
cons: ['No Cons have been reported by the Glassdoor community.']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

About You', 'You excel using data science and machine learning to analyze large and complex data sets to develop and drive business strategy. You effectively communicate complex data analytics to executives, partners across the business, and teammates in a clear, concise manner that facilitates decision-making. You recruit, develop, and lead your team. Your guide and challenge them to think deeply, bring new ideas and solve problems creatively. We are a highly diverse, collaborative, and entrepreneurial team of innovators, on a mission to transform the way ISPs serve consumers today. 2022 will be a pivotal year for our company, as we transform our service approach, lead the way in fiber technology innovations, and launch an enviable brand and customer experience.', '', '', '']

descriptions_list: ['We are looking for a developer data scientist to support in identifying, designing and implementing data science & artificial intelligence solutions.', 'The ideal candidate should have exceptional skills in programming machine learning models, as well as knowledge of data science, statistics, machine learning algorithms, and software engineering.', 'Assess machine learning development techniques & algorithms to incorporate into model development cycle', 'Use software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle of Machine Learning models, including coding standards, code reviews, version control management, testing, deployment, and monitoring', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['A SaaS company located in Irvine, CA is looking for a talented Data Engineer to join their team of fun and creative people who are building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The team is building technology that is disrupting the industry and is growing very rapidly.', 'As a Data Engineer in their IT department, you will work in small teams to design, build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', 'As a Data Engineer, you should have expertise in the design, creation, management, and business use of large data sets. You know and love working with analytic tools, can write excellent SQL and ELT code using Snowflake, and can use your technical skills and creative approaches to solve some unique problems in the BI space. In this role, you will get an opportunity to solve some of the most challenging business problems facing the organization.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['THE COMPANY: For over 60 years our client, Wilsonart, has been a world leading manufacturing and distribution organization driven by a mission to create innovative, high performance surfaces people love, with world-class service their customers can count on, delivered by people who care. Headquartered in Austin, Texas, today they do business in more than 100 countries operating under the Wilsonart®, Resopal®, Polyrey®, Arborite®, Laminart®, Bushboard™, Mermaid™, Shore®, Ralph Wilson®, KML®, NewLeaf®, Wetwall®, Durcon® and Technistone® brands.', 'THE ROLE: The BI Developer will work as a member of the Global BI/EPM team to design, build, and maintain global data warehouse solutions. Success in this role requires a deep understanding of data analysis, extensive experience developing ETL from source systems, designing data models, building actionable reports and dashboards, and having a proven ability to lead projects to completion within established schedules and timelines. This position needs to work collaboratively with other onsite and offshore BI developers, Hyperion developers, and Global IT partners to ensure solutions are cohesive.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Company Overview:', 'Headquartered in San Diego, DecisionLogic is a leading FinTech company providing a suite of integrated financial asset verification and credit scoring solutions across major financing verticals. In the last ten years, our SaaS platform has served more than fifty million consumers and over two thousand clients around the world. We are currently expanding into a wide variety of new markets with an aggressive growth plan that includes exciting new product development and feature releases. We are proud to offer the opportunity to join a dynamic team and company that is stable and growing.', 'Summary:', 'We are currently seeking a talented Senior Data Engineer for the San Diego Headquarters.', 'The candidate selected for this position will collaborate and support all departments across the company, from Product to Marketing, Technology to Support. They will work with existing and new technologies as we undergo a period of optimization of existing services, and design and build new solutions that rely on advanced database technologies, including machine learning.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_list: ['We are looking for a developer data scientist to support in identifying, designing and implementing data science & artificial intelligence solutions.', 'The ideal candidate should have exceptional skills in programming machine learning models, as well as knowledge of data science, statistics, machine learning algorithms, and software engineering.', 'Assess machine learning development techniques & algorithms to incorporate into model development cycle', 'Use software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle of Machine Learning models, including coding standards, code reviews, version control management, testing, deployment, and monitoring', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Qualifications', '*EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE\n*', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics or related field is required. A master’s degree or doctorate degree is highly desired. Six years of progressively responsible experience working in a statistically oriented research field, such as survey research, database analysis or actuarial research. Experience should include creating and optimizing business intelligence datasets and dashboards, quantitative analysis, operations, project management or related fields. Extensive knowledge and application of data analysis software (e.g. R. Stata), data visualization software (e.g. SQL, R, Python, etc.) and conducting advanced data analytics (e.g. Multivariate statistics, network and cluster analysis, forecasting, machine learning and pattern matching). Must be able to work independently and collectively as a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. Experience working in a public or transit environment is desired. Directly related work experience may be substituted on a year-for-year basis in-lieu of educational requirement.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Insurity is a leading property and casualty insurance software and data analytics provider, working with some of the world’s largest insurers, brokers, and MGAs, including 15 of the top 25 P&C carriers in the US. With 900+ team members globally, 10 office locations, and 300+ customers, we have a deep understanding of the insurance business, unparalleled technology expertise, and a singular focus of delivering a simplified insurance experience to our customers.', 'Our Data Scientist will be an integral part of Insurity Analytics, working closely and collaboratively with insurance domain authorities, data analysts, engineers, and customers. They will develop highly robust predictive models that provide significant and measurable results for our customers. Additionally, they will partner with the sales and marketing teams to perform then deliver modeling proofs-of-concept & retro-tests, as well as help craft and deliver compelling product performance reads, product & concept education, and value proposition messaging.', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['A SaaS company located in Irvine, CA is looking for a talented Data Engineer to join their team of fun and creative people who are building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The team is building technology that is disrupting the industry and is growing very rapidly.', 'As a Data Engineer in their IT department, you will work in small teams to design, build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', 'As a Data Engineer, you should have expertise in the design, creation, management, and business use of large data sets. You know and love working with analytic tools, can write excellent SQL and ELT code using Snowflake, and can use your technical skills and creative approaches to solve some unique problems in the BI space. In this role, you will get an opportunity to solve some of the most challenging business problems facing the organization.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Clinical Data Scientist', 'Remote – US Only', 'About Vivante', 'Vivante Health is an innovative startup reinventing the way chronic conditions are managed. We’re filling the unmet needs of people with chronic conditions that are invisible, neglected or stigmatized, starting with digestive disease.', 'Why digestive? Because an astonishing 70 million people in the US are affected—that’s twice the number with diabetes and more than many other chronic conditions combined. Unlike other chronic conditions, though, digestive diseases often go untreated or misdiagnosed…because of stigma.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['General Description for Data Scientist:', 'Responsibilities:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['We are looking for a developer data scientist to support in identifying, designing and implementing data science & artificial intelligence solutions.', 'The ideal candidate should have exceptional skills in programming machine learning models, as well as knowledge of data science, statistics, machine learning algorithms, and software engineering.', 'Assess machine learning development techniques & algorithms to incorporate into model development cycle', 'Use software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle of Machine Learning models, including coding standards, code reviews, version control management, testing, deployment, and monitoring', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Qualifications', '*EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE\n*', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics or related field is required. A master’s degree or doctorate degree is highly desired. Six years of progressively responsible experience working in a statistically oriented research field, such as survey research, database analysis or actuarial research. Experience should include creating and optimizing business intelligence datasets and dashboards, quantitative analysis, operations, project management or related fields. Extensive knowledge and application of data analysis software (e.g. R. Stata), data visualization software (e.g. SQL, R, Python, etc.) and conducting advanced data analytics (e.g. Multivariate statistics, network and cluster analysis, forecasting, machine learning and pattern matching). Must be able to work independently and collectively as a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. Experience working in a public or transit environment is desired. Directly related work experience may be substituted on a year-for-year basis in-lieu of educational requirement.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
pros: ['"Good people, benefits, and a fun place to work" (in 1 reviews)']
cons: ['No Cons have been reported by the Glassdoor community.']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

We welcome candidates from different backgrounds, as we believe that diverse, inclusive teams are better teams.', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! descriptions_txt: ['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['THE COMPANY: For over 60 years our client, Wilsonart, has been a world leading manufacturing and distribution organization driven by a mission to create innovative, high performance surfaces people love, with world-class service their customers can count on, delivered by people who care. Headquartered in Austin, Texas, today they do business in more than 100 countries operating under the Wilsonart®, Resopal®, Polyrey®, Arborite®, Laminart®, Bushboard™, Mermaid™, Shore®, Ralph Wilson®, KML®, NewLeaf®, Wetwall®, Durcon® and Technistone® brands.', 'THE ROLE: The BI Developer will work as a member of the Global BI/EPM team to design, build, and maintain global data warehouse solutions. Success in this role requires a deep understanding of data analysis, extensive experience developing ETL from source systems, designing data models, building actionable reports and dashboards, and having a proven ability to lead projects to completion within established schedules and timelines. This position needs to work collaboratively with other onsite and offshore BI developers, Hyperion developers, and Global IT partners to ensure solutions are cohesive.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

You will be working closely with and learning from some of the brightest people in the industry. Students can expect to be challenged by their project plan, connect with other students, and feel valued by the Vertex community. descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The B2B Insights & Analytics team exists to drive optimal decision-making that improves our business customers’ FF&E shopping experience through Sales interactions. We seek to optimize Sales incrementality by identifying the most CLV-accretive Sales interactions with customers, as a critical driver of our flywheel. The data we are experts in represents the voice of external customers (e.g. onsite activity, communication with Business accounts, orders, & firmographic data) and internal customers (e.g. onsite activity, communication between Sales representatives & Business accounts, CRM, and Sales Operations data) - we source, interpret and translate that voice into action that serves our customers. This team leads measurement - particularly around causal inference - and also plays a data challenger role to ensure the STO understands the “why” behind great customer experiences. And we partner closely with Data Science - to jointly develop and apply machine learning approaches to drive growth, and Data Solutions/Engineering - to ensure we have a strong, and high-velocity data foundation.\nApplied Data Science - B2B Sales Incrementality Optimization team exists to identify opportunities and provide actionable recommendations based on hard data to grow revenue and improve efficiency. We strive to deliver better understanding of customers and improve the engagement model between Sales and customers.\nWe expect team members and management to take high degree of ownership for their areas of focus, and execute on ideas and deliver results under fast-paced cultures. Beyond a strong academic background, a successful candidate will have experience successfully designing and launching A/B testing, measuring impact for unbalanced or skewed data sets, building models and/or creatively leveraging model outputs to improve the existing Sales program structures or Sales engagement models. We are looking for someone who is a self-starter, who approaches complex business questions with data and curiosity, who dives below the surface to identify the causal relationship rather than just trends, and who works effectively with technical and non-technical cross-functional teams.', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Scientist', 'Clearance: None Required', 'Type: Full-Time', 'Start Date: Immediately', 'Salary: Negotiable, Based on Experience', 'Location: Washington, DC', 'Travel: None', 'Praescient Analytics, LLC is a Veteran-led, certified Woman-Owned Small Business (WOSB) founded in 2011 which specializes in implementing advanced analytics solutions across the defense, intelligence, and law enforcement communities. With over 40 contracts across 6 continents, over 70% of our employees are veterans and or have intelligence, law enforcement or counter fraud experience. We fully understand the unique challenges of our clients and work to identify, vet, implement, and enhance commercial and proprietary technologies to provide full scope solutions, because we have been there. Praescient has extensive experience designing, developing, and integrating solutions for customers including the US Army, Special Operations Command (SOCOM), US Navy (USN), US Marine Corps (USMC), US Coast Guard (USCG), Department of Justice (DOJ), Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA), and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), intelligence community, and local law enforcement agencies, among others.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
