descriptions_txt: ['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Come join a growing financial technology company that’s leading the marketplace in both the marketing and servicing of credit cards! Continental Finance Company specializes in credit card options for those consumers with less than perfect credit. We are seeking a Data Scientist to support our Data Science team.', "The Data Scientist will be responsible for developing quantitative/analytic models and applications in support of the firm's risk underwriting and marketing effort. This role focuses on the development of models, strategies, and operational guidelines for the organization's various credit card products as they relate to the analysis, tracking, and reporting of various risk metrics. This role requires advanced degree in statistics/probability, physics, applied mathematics or another heavy quantitative discipline. Our Quantitative Analytic staff is focused on and responsible for the development of the theory and mathematics behind various models. This position reports to Chief Data Scientist.", '***CFC offers a hybrid work schedule which includes three (3) core days in the office (Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday) and two (2) remote workdays (Monday and Friday)***', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Qualifications', '*EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE\n*', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics or related field is required. A master’s degree or doctorate degree is highly desired. Six years of progressively responsible experience working in a statistically oriented research field, such as survey research, database analysis or actuarial research. Experience should include creating and optimizing business intelligence datasets and dashboards, quantitative analysis, operations, project management or related fields. Extensive knowledge and application of data analysis software (e.g. R. Stata), data visualization software (e.g. SQL, R, Python, etc.) and conducting advanced data analytics (e.g. Multivariate statistics, network and cluster analysis, forecasting, machine learning and pattern matching). Must be able to work independently and collectively as a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. Experience working in a public or transit environment is desired. Directly related work experience may be substituted on a year-for-year basis in-lieu of educational requirement.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['At Density, we build one of the most advanced people sensing systems in the world. The product and infrastructure is nuanced and one-of-a-kind. Building this product for scale has been an exercise in patience, creativity, remarkable engineering, laser physics, global logistics, and grit. The team is thoughtful, driven, and world-class.
We build systems that are real-time, accurate, and anonymous by design. Our systems help today’s largest companies understand how their buildings get used. We have counted hundreds of millions of people.
Counting people in “real-time” is unique and particularly hard to achieve. It allows a user to walk into a room, beneath our sensor, and see the room’s occupancy increment 700ms later.
Today alone, Density will ingest over 1m events. In the coming year, our sensor network is on track to grow ten-fold. The overall system load is exploding. Maintaining our low latency standards requires an increasingly thoughtful system.
We’re architecting infrastructure where annual, unscheduled downtime is measured in minutes. We’re building intelligent redundancies so missed events are an oddity. We’re constructing an exceptional engineering team to support always-on, intelligible analytics generated on the fly.
This role reports to our Director of Data Science & Engineering.
As a at Density, you will work on algorithms developed for applications deployed on state-of-the-art remote devices as well as our cloud platform. The data you will work with includes ToF depth data, point clouds from radar, and device parameters. Algorithms include computer vision segmentation identification, 3D point cloud surface analysis, and optimization algorithms for sensor tuning. Join a team of experienced data scientists as we expand what is possible.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Qualifications', '*EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE\n*', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics or related field is required. A master’s degree or doctorate degree is highly desired. Six years of progressively responsible experience working in a statistically oriented research field, such as survey research, database analysis or actuarial research. Experience should include creating and optimizing business intelligence datasets and dashboards, quantitative analysis, operations, project management or related fields. Extensive knowledge and application of data analysis software (e.g. R. Stata), data visualization software (e.g. SQL, R, Python, etc.) and conducting advanced data analytics (e.g. Multivariate statistics, network and cluster analysis, forecasting, machine learning and pattern matching). Must be able to work independently and collectively as a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. Experience working in a public or transit environment is desired. descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ["Hi, we're Oscar. We're hiring an Operations Engineer to join our Insurance Operations team.", "Oscar is the first health insurance company built around a full stack technology platform and a focus on serving our members. We started Oscar in 2012 to create the kind of health insurance company we would want for ourselves—one that behaves like a doctor in the family.\nAbout the role\nThe Data Stewardship team safeguards the core data sets essential to Oscar's operations. We structure data and documents to improve usability across all of Oscar; establish infrastructures; model future performance to reduce longer-term risks; design and refine testing strategies and design and institute data integrity monitoring; and own data integrations with partners. The team also serves as ambassadors and data experts to partners around the company, including Data, Product, Engineering, and Finance.", "You will design, develops/builds, tests and implement data and technical solutions with a focus on creating efficiency and scale through technology and automation of Oscar's infrastructure and underlying logic for core insurance functions. You will Understand Oscar's infrastructure, underlying logic, and data models, and works to work on requirements/rules that support our needs. You will Identify opportunities for technology enablement, apply technical expertise to design, and implementation of solutions to address operational challenges across the core insurance functions.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Job Summary:\nFust Charles Chambers LLP, a premier accounting, tax and advisory services Firm in Central New York is seeking a Data Analyst that is looking to apply their data analysis skills and experience in delivering services to the Firm’s clients and learn and grow within the Firm.\nDuties/Responsibilities:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['Various data analysis responsibilities associated with performance audits', 'Develop, implement and update testing methodologies and audit programs to determine compliance with various regulations, laws, policies and procedures', 'Gather and analyze financial and other data/information related to the engagement', 'Interpret data and analyze outcomes to ensure accurate testing results', 'Document test work performed in clear and concise workpapers providing audit trail of work performed', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ["Hi, we're Oscar. We're hiring an Operations Engineer to join our Insurance Operations team.", "Oscar is the first health insurance company built around a full stack technology platform and a focus on serving our members. We started Oscar in 2012 to create the kind of health insurance company we would want for ourselves—one that behaves like a doctor in the family.\nAbout the role\nThe Data Stewardship team safeguards the core data sets essential to Oscar's operations. We structure data and documents to improve usability across all of Oscar; establish infrastructures; model future performance to reduce longer-term risks; design and refine testing strategies and design and institute data integrity monitoring; and own data integrations with partners. The team also serves as ambassadors and data experts to partners around the company, including Data, Product, Engineering, and Finance.", "You will design, develops/builds, tests and implement data and technical solutions with a focus on creating efficiency and scale through technology and automation of Oscar's infrastructure and underlying logic for core insurance functions. You will Understand Oscar's infrastructure, underlying logic, and data models, and works to work on requirements/rules that support our needs. You will Identify opportunities for technology enablement, apply technical expertise to design, and implementation of solutions to address operational challenges across the core insurance functions.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Imagine working in a place where continuous improvement and innovation is celebrated and rewarded; where fast-paced, high-impact teams come together to positively drive results for one of the largest & most iconic brands in the world.', '', 'As the only rapidly growing retailer, you may know us as your friendly neighborhood store. You probably know our familiar name, have seen our pervasive logo, and have tried our highly sought-after products, such as Slurpee® and Big Bite®. “Brain Freeze” is a 7-Eleven registered trademark for our 53-year old Slurpee® and with over 77,000 stores globally (more than any other retailer or food service provider), we sell over 14 million a month.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['We are looking for a passionate Data Analyst to turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. This role is based out of our West Chester offices in PA.', 'Primary responsibilities will include:', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['Partner with customer and business teams to gather accurate requirements for reporting and analytics', 'Design, develop, validate and publish reports using Tableau, ensuring they meet all customer requirements, and with minimal rework', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Echelon Energy (EE) is seeking an Energy and Data Program Manager to work with our Audit and Planning team and its related functions. EE specializes in design-build and performance-based specialty contracting for institutional and commercial real estate owners in order to create quantifiable environmental impact through energy and utilities savings. We provide a fully-integrated energy management platform that incorporates energy auditing, retro-commissioning, project management, measurement & verification and sustainability consulting services. Our customers include some of the largest institutional and commercial real estate companies in the United States and we’re quickly growing our team to support our expanding client base. descriptions_txt: ['Job Description', 'Job Description', 'The Vertex Co-op Program offers students the opportunity to learn about the pharmaceutical industry from a hands-on perspective. You will be working closely with and learning from some of the brightest people in the industry. When you join our Co-op program you should not be surprised to see that our environment is one that is innovative and team oriented, where collaboration is not just a word, and "we are fearless" is in everything we do. Students can expect to be challenged by their project plan, connect with other students, and feel valued by the Vertex community. Not only will students learn about their day-to-day tasks through their specific work assignments, but they will interact and have exposure to our organizational leaders and their teams through a series of Professional Development Workshops.\n\nBe FEARLESS... Join us and help kick start the path to your career!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
pros: ['"working conditions ok ok ok" (in 1 reviews)']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
pros: ['"Good people, benefits, and a fun place to work" (in 1 reviews)']
cons: ['No Cons have been reported by the Glassdoor community.']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ["Hi, we're Oscar. We're hiring an Operations Engineer to join our Insurance Operations team.", "Oscar is the first health insurance company built around a full stack technology platform and a focus on serving our members. We started Oscar in 2012 to create the kind of health insurance company we would want for ourselves—one that behaves like a doctor in the family.\nAbout the role\nThe Data Stewardship team safeguards the core data sets essential to Oscar's operations. We structure data and documents to improve usability across all of Oscar; establish infrastructures; model future performance to reduce longer-term risks; design and refine testing strategies and design and institute data integrity monitoring; and own data integrations with partners. The team also serves as ambassadors and data experts to partners around the company, including Data, Product, Engineering, and Finance.", "You will design, develops/builds, tests and implement data and technical solutions with a focus on creating efficiency and scale through technology and automation of Oscar's infrastructure and underlying logic for core insurance functions. You will Understand Oscar's infrastructure, underlying logic, and data models, and works to work on requirements/rules that support our needs. You will Identify opportunities for technology enablement, apply technical expertise to design, and implementation of solutions to address operational challenges across the core insurance functions.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Davidson is seeking a Data Scientist in Huntsville, AL.', 'This position is an integral part of a fast-paced, innovative research and development (R&D) program for the US Air Force’s (USAF) Advanced Battle Management System (ABMS) involving the creation of advanced M&S and AI for wired and wireless communications across all 5 warfare domains (land, sea, air, space, and cyberspace). The program works cross-functionally with innovative team members skilled in High-Performance Computing (HPC), Modeling & Simulations (M&S), Artificial Intelligence (AI)/Data Analytics, and Cybersecurity.', 'The qualified candidate should be able to:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Clinical Data Scientist', 'Remote – US Only', 'About Vivante', 'Vivante Health is an innovative startup reinventing the way chronic conditions are managed. We’re filling the unmet needs of people with chronic conditions that are invisible, neglected or stigmatized, starting with digestive disease.', 'Why digestive? Because an astonishing 70 million people in the US are affected—that’s twice the number with diabetes and more than many other chronic conditions combined. Unlike other chronic conditions, though, digestive diseases often go untreated or misdiagnosed…because of stigma.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Discover. A brighter future.', "With us, you’ll do meaningful work from Day 1. You will be working closely with and learning from some of the brightest people in the industry. When you join our Co-op program you should not be surprised to see that our environment is one that is innovative and team oriented, where collaboration is not just a word, and "we are fearless" is in everything we do. Students can expect to be challenged by their project plan, connect with other students, and feel valued by the Vertex community. descriptions_txt: ['This job is remote!', "O'Neil Global Advisors (OGA) is an investment advisor that builds algorithmic strategies based on proprietary quantitative factor research pioneered by investing legend William J. O'Neil. ['Insurity is a leading property and casualty insurance software and data analytics provider, working with some of the world’s largest insurers, brokers, and MGAs, including 15 of the top 25 P&C carriers in the US. descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

You will be working closely with and learning from some of the brightest people in the industry. When you join our Co-op program you should not be surprised to see that our environment is one that is innovative and team oriented, where collaboration is not just a word, and "we are fearless" is in everything we do. Students can expect to be challenged by their project plan, connect with other students, and feel valued by the Vertex community. Not only will students learn about their day-to-day tasks through their specific work assignments, but they will interact and have exposure to our organizational leaders and their teams through a series of Professional Development Workshops.\n\nBe FEARLESS... descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview:', 'Headquartered in San Diego, DecisionLogic is a leading FinTech company providing a suite of integrated financial asset verification and credit scoring solutions across major financing verticals. In the last ten years, our SaaS platform has served more than fifty million consumers and over two thousand clients around the world. We are currently expanding into a wide variety of new markets with an aggressive growth plan that includes exciting new product development and feature releases. We are proud to offer the opportunity to join a dynamic team and company that is stable and growing.', 'Summary:', 'We are currently seeking a talented Senior Data Engineer for the San Diego Headquarters.', 'The candidate selected for this position will collaborate and support all departments across the company, from Product to Marketing, Technology to Support. They will work with existing and new technologies as we undergo a period of optimization of existing services, and design and build new solutions that rely on advanced database technologies, including machine learning.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
