descriptions_txt: ['Clinical Data Scientist', 'Remote – US Only', 'About Vivante', 'Vivante Health is an innovative startup reinventing the way chronic conditions are managed. We’re filling the unmet needs of people with chronic conditions that are invisible, neglected or stigmatized, starting with digestive disease.', 'Why digestive? Because an astonishing 70 million people in the US are affected—that’s twice the number with diabetes and more than many other chronic conditions combined. Unlike other chronic conditions, though, digestive diseases often go untreated or misdiagnosed…because of stigma.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Product Owner, Data Visualization', 'Verstand AI is a data management consultancy and product development firm that works in multiple commercial business verticals (e.g., retail, pharma, finance, energy) and global public sector entities. The firm specializes in developing cloud-based data architectures, business intelligence platforms and machine learning models for client stakeholders.', 'Our commercial practice is in need of teammates that can balance the strategy, governance, and implementation of data related products and facilitate conversations between all impacted stakeholders—C-Level executives, engineers, analysts, other product teams and line business executives who consume data.', "As a key member of the team, you'll have the ability to shape projects, bring on new technologies and interact with stakeholders to address important issues for various companies and society in general.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['General Description for Data Scientist:', 'Responsibilities:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['We are looking for a developer data scientist to support in identifying, designing and implementing data science & artificial intelligence solutions.', 'The ideal candidate should have exceptional skills in programming machine learning models, as well as knowledge of data science, statistics, machine learning algorithms, and software engineering.', 'Assess machine learning development techniques & algorithms to incorporate into model development cycle', 'Use software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle of Machine Learning models, including coding standards, code reviews, version control management, testing, deployment, and monitoring', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Address:', '', 'Job Family Group:', '', 'Applies knowledge of advanced analytic algorithms and technologies (e.g. machine learning, deep learning, artificial intelligence) to deliver better predictions and/or intelligent automation that enables smarter business decisions, improved customer experience, and drives productivity. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['About us:', 'HDAI is a well-funded, high-growth, and ambitious startup that is using artificial intelligence to provide clinical and operational guidance that supports population health and clinical decision-making. We are partnering with premier health systems to deploy actionable AI, with a particular focus on delivering insights that support population health initiatives.', 'HDAI is located in Dedham, MA near the Commuter Rail (25 minutes from Back Bay and South Station, Boston) and I-95/128. Interviews are being conducted remotely, and the position is currently fully remote and will be flexible as to location going forward.', 'PURPOSE OF POSITION: Under direction of the Director of Clinical Insights, the Clinical Programs Specialist utilizes their in-depth knowledge of health care practices (acute and ambulatory), Electronic Health Record (EHR) and clinical best practices to assist in the on-going growth of our healthcare AI solutions. The right candidate will work closely with our data science, product, and customer-facing teams to generate data sets derived from healthcare billing records that provide insights for clinical and operational leaders at leading organizations around the country.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Job Summary:\nFust Charles Chambers LLP, a premier accounting, tax and advisory services Firm in Central New York is seeking a Data Analyst that is looking to apply their data analysis skills and experience in delivering services to the Firm’s clients and learn and grow within the Firm.\nDuties/Responsibilities:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['Various data analysis responsibilities associated with performance audits', 'Develop, implement and update testing methodologies and audit programs to determine compliance with various regulations, laws, policies and procedures', 'Gather and analyze financial and other data/information related to the engagement', 'Interpret data and analyze outcomes to ensure accurate testing results', 'Document test work performed in clear and concise workpapers providing audit trail of work performed', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

About You', 'You excel using data science and machine learning to analyze large and complex data sets to develop and drive business strategy. descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Sleep Number team members are part of a passionate, purpose-driven culture that supports improving the health and wellbeing of society through higher quality sleep. We are not just focused on our customers, however; being employed by Sleep Number means your personal wellbeing is important, too. As we continue to grow, we are looking for team members who will bring their unique personalities, backgrounds, and skills to work. Whether you are entering, returning, or experienced in the workforce, we have a place for you.', '', 'In our 35+ years in the industry we have improved over 13 million lives, and we are just getting started. With 5,000+ team members nationwide supporting work disciplines from technology to manufacturing, retail stores to field services technicians, corporate teams to customer service, we are a sleep innovation leader because of our team members. Now is a great time to join us as we invest further in our people and sleep innovation. #TeamSleepNumber', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['We are looking for a passionate Data Analyst to turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. As a Data Analyst you will be responsible for requirements gathering, data analysis, reporting, analytics and helping to drive business solutions to support the operations ongoing growth. The successful candidate will have a keen sense of detail and accuracy, a passion for learning and will be capable of finding meaning in data and turning insights into meaningful actions. This role specifically calls for the person to create visually impactful Tableau reporting using optimized SQL queries to pull data from reporting databases. This role is based out of our West Chester offices in PA.', 'Primary responsibilities will include:', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['Partner with customer and business teams to gather accurate requirements for reporting and analytics', 'Design, develop, validate and publish reports using Tableau, ensuring they meet all customer requirements, and with minimal rework', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

We welcome candidates from different backgrounds, as we believe that diverse, inclusive teams are better teams.', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

cons: ['"Management was rude and tough on you" (in 12 reviews)', '"During the orientation/onboarding we were shown videos telling us how much their employees meant to them, how family friendly they were, and that happy employees directly reflected that to customers." descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['About us:', 'HDAI is a well-funded, high-growth, and ambitious startup that is using artificial intelligence to provide clinical and operational guidance that supports population health and clinical decision-making. We are partnering with premier health systems to deploy actionable AI, with a particular focus on delivering insights that support population health initiatives.', 'HDAI is located in Dedham, MA near the Commuter Rail (25 minutes from Back Bay and South Station, Boston) and I-95/128. Interviews are being conducted remotely, and the position is currently fully remote and will be flexible as to location going forward.', 'PURPOSE OF POSITION: Under direction of the Director of Clinical Insights, the Clinical Programs Specialist utilizes their in-depth knowledge of health care practices (acute and ambulatory), Electronic Health Record (EHR) and clinical best practices to assist in the on-going growth of our healthcare AI solutions. The right candidate will work closely with our data science, product, and customer-facing teams to generate data sets derived from healthcare billing records that provide insights for clinical and operational leaders at leading organizations around the country.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['ABOUT YOU', 'Are you an analytical, data-driven professional? Are you interested in a role that enables you to have a direct impact on the company’s products and services? If so, then Ancera is the place for you!', 'Join our team and help us unlock actionable insights that will enable food producers to assess microbial risk from farm to consumer, and feed billions of people around the world without worry or risk.', 'ABOUT US', "Ancera's True North is delivering new science to improve agricultural productivity.", 'Ancera is dedicated to improving the way we feed the world. We were founded with the discovery of a novel way of quickly identifying bacterial threats in the food supply and built on that vision to give farmers, veterinarians, quality managers, and corporate executives new tools to improve all phases of their operations, from farm to market.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Data Scientist', 'Clearance: None Required', 'Type: Full-Time', 'Start Date: Immediately', 'Salary: Negotiable, Based on Experience', 'Location: Washington, DC', 'Travel: None', 'Praescient Analytics, LLC is a Veteran-led, certified Woman-Owned Small Business (WOSB) founded in 2011 which specializes in implementing advanced analytics solutions across the defense, intelligence, and law enforcement communities. With over 40 contracts across 6 continents, over 70% of our employees are veterans and or have intelligence, law enforcement or counter fraud experience. We fully understand the unique challenges of our clients and work to identify, vet, implement, and enhance commercial and proprietary technologies to provide full scope solutions, because we have been there. Praescient has extensive experience designing, developing, and integrating solutions for customers including the US Army, Special Operations Command (SOCOM), US Navy (USN), US Marine Corps (USMC), US Coast Guard (USCG), Department of Justice (DOJ), Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA), and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), intelligence community, and local law enforcement agencies, among others.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The B2B Insights & Analytics team exists to drive optimal decision-making that improves our business customers’ FF&E shopping experience through Sales interactions. We seek to optimize Sales incrementality by identifying the most CLV-accretive Sales interactions with customers, as a critical driver of our flywheel. The data we are experts in represents the voice of external customers (e.g. onsite activity, communication with Business accounts, orders, & firmographic data) and internal customers (e.g. onsite activity, communication between Sales representatives & Business accounts, CRM, and Sales Operations data) - we source, interpret and translate that voice into action that serves our customers. This team leads measurement - particularly around causal inference - and also plays a data challenger role to ensure the STO understands the “why” behind great customer experiences. And we partner closely with Data Science - to jointly develop and apply machine learning approaches to drive growth, and Data Solutions/Engineering - to ensure we have a strong, and high-velocity data foundation.\nApplied Data Science - B2B Sales Incrementality Optimization team exists to identify opportunities and provide actionable recommendations based on hard data to grow revenue and improve efficiency. We strive to deliver better understanding of customers and improve the engagement model between Sales and customers.\nWe expect team members and management to take high degree of ownership for their areas of focus, and execute on ideas and deliver results under fast-paced cultures. Beyond a strong academic background, a successful candidate will have experience successfully designing and launching A/B testing, measuring impact for unbalanced or skewed data sets, building models and/or creatively leveraging model outputs to improve the existing Sales program structures or Sales engagement models. We are looking for someone who is a self-starter, who approaches complex business questions with data and curiosity, who dives below the surface to identify the causal relationship rather than just trends, and who works effectively with technical and non-technical cross-functional teams.', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
pros: ['"Good people, benefits, and a fun place to work" (in 1 reviews)']

descriptions_txt: ['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Come join a growing financial technology company that’s leading the marketplace in both the marketing and servicing of credit cards! Continental Finance Company specializes in credit card options for those consumers with less than perfect credit. We are seeking a Data Scientist to support our Data Science team.', "The Data Scientist will be responsible for developing quantitative/analytic models and applications in support of the firm's risk underwriting and marketing effort. This role focuses on the development of models, strategies, and operational guidelines for the organization's various credit card products as they relate to the analysis, tracking, and reporting of various risk metrics. This role requires advanced degree in statistics/probability, physics, applied mathematics or another heavy quantitative discipline. Our Quantitative Analytic staff is focused on and responsible for the development of the theory and mathematics behind various models. This position reports to Chief Data Scientist.", '***CFC offers a hybrid work schedule which includes three (3) core days in the office (Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday) and two (2) remote workdays (Monday and Friday)***', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Qualifications', '*EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE\n*', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics or related field is required. A master’s degree or doctorate degree is highly desired. Six years of progressively responsible experience working in a statistically oriented research field, such as survey research, database analysis or actuarial research. Experience should include creating and optimizing business intelligence datasets and dashboards, quantitative analysis, operations, project management or related fields. Extensive knowledge and application of data analysis software (e.g. R. Stata), data visualization software (e.g. SQL, R, Python, etc.) and conducting advanced data analytics (e.g. Multivariate statistics, network and cluster analysis, forecasting, machine learning and pattern matching). Must be able to work independently and collectively as a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. Experience working in a public or transit environment is desired. Directly related work experience may be substituted on a year-for-year basis in-lieu of educational requirement.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Opanga Networks is seeking a talented Data Scientist with the right aptitude and attitude to join our team. Opanga is a growing company on the cutting edge of wireless network management technologies. Our team creates a variety of products based on our core network optimization technology. We are looking for a Data Scientist that will help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality reports and dashboards integrated with our products. Duties and Responsibilities:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['Collaborate with product management and engineering departments to understand company needs and devise possible solutions', 'Data mining using state-of-the-art methods', 'Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['At Density, we build one of the most advanced people sensing systems in the world. The product and infrastructure is nuanced and one-of-a-kind. Building this product for scale has been an exercise in patience, creativity, remarkable engineering, laser physics, global logistics, and grit. The team is thoughtful, driven, and world-class.
We build systems that are real-time, accurate, and anonymous by design. Our systems help today’s largest companies understand how their buildings get used. We have counted hundreds of millions of people.
Counting people in “real-time” is unique and particularly hard to achieve. It allows a user to walk into a room, beneath our sensor, and see the room’s occupancy increment 700ms later.
Today alone, Density will ingest over 1m events. In the coming year, our sensor network is on track to grow ten-fold. The overall system load is exploding. Maintaining our low latency standards requires an increasingly thoughtful system.
We’re architecting infrastructure where annual, unscheduled downtime is measured in minutes. We’re building intelligent redundancies so missed events are an oddity. We’re constructing an exceptional engineering team to support always-on, intelligible analytics generated on the fly.
This role reports to our Director of Data Science & Engineering.
As a at Density, you will work on algorithms developed for applications deployed on state-of-the-art remote devices as well as our cloud platform. The data you will work with includes ToF depth data, point clouds from radar, and device parameters. Algorithms include computer vision segmentation identification, 3D point cloud surface analysis, and optimization algorithms for sensor tuning. Join a team of experienced data scientists as we expand what is possible.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. descriptions_txt: ['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['About us:', 'HDAI is a well-funded, high-growth, and ambitious startup that is using artificial intelligence to provide clinical and operational guidance that supports population health and clinical decision-making. We are partnering with premier health systems to deploy actionable AI, with a particular focus on delivering insights that support population health initiatives.', 'HDAI is located in Dedham, MA near the Commuter Rail (25 minutes from Back Bay and South Station, Boston) and I-95/128. Interviews are being conducted remotely, and the position is currently fully remote and will be flexible as to location going forward.', 'PURPOSE OF POSITION: Under direction of the Director of Clinical Insights, the Clinical Programs Specialist utilizes their in-depth knowledge of health care practices (acute and ambulatory), Electronic Health Record (EHR) and clinical best practices to assist in the on-going growth of our healthcare AI solutions. The right candidate will work closely with our data science, product, and customer-facing teams to generate data sets derived from healthcare billing records that provide insights for clinical and operational leaders at leading organizations around the country.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Data Scientist', 'Clearance: None Required', 'Type: Full-Time', 'Start Date: Immediately', 'Salary: Negotiable, Based on Experience', 'Location: Washington, DC', 'Travel: None', 'Praescient Analytics, LLC is a Veteran-led, certified Woman-Owned Small Business (WOSB) founded in 2011 which specializes in implementing advanced analytics solutions across the defense, intelligence, and law enforcement communities. With over 40 contracts across 6 continents, over 70% of our employees are veterans and or have intelligence, law enforcement or counter fraud experience. We fully understand the unique challenges of our clients and work to identify, vet, implement, and enhance commercial and proprietary technologies to provide full scope solutions, because we have been there. Praescient has extensive experience designing, developing, and integrating solutions for customers including the US Army, Special Operations Command (SOCOM), US Navy (USN), US Marine Corps (USMC), US Coast Guard (USCG), Department of Justice (DOJ), Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA), and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), intelligence community, and local law enforcement agencies, among others.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['', 'At Swickard Auto Group, we’re passionate about our customers and using the most innovative, cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way customers purchase and service their vehicles at our dealerships.', 'Our customers are the reason we’re here. Our culture is defined by a few core principles: We want to be our customers’ favorite place to purchase, lease, or service their vehicle, and we want to be your favorite place to work! We are a hospitality company that happens to be in the automotive industry. We are data-driven, and our aim is to use data to continuously improve the in-store and online guest experience with our dealerships.', 'Automotive News ranks Swickard Auto Group as one of the top dealer groups in the US. We are looking for like-minded team members that are laser focused on discovering insights in data to identify ways we can continue improving each interaction with our customers. Swickard’s unique perspective on automotive retail strategy is transforming the automotive industry and we are looking for top-notch individuals to join our fast-growing team.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Data Science Engineer', 'M-Tech Systems is a stable, fast growing, and industry leading international software development company headquartered in the Dunwoody/400 - Perimeter Area of Atlanta. Retaining and recruiting outstanding team members is a mission-critical component of our ongoing success.', 'M-Tech Systems offers competitive salaries, excellent benefits, a working atmosphere that encourages collaboration, comfortable facilities, exceptional IT tools, training, and ongoing opportunities to work with senior and executive management.', 'Job Brief:', 'The Data Science Engineer’s role involves accumulating and deriving meaning from large datasets. The Data Science Engineer needs to be able to apply statistical and machine learning models, such as non-linear regressions, boosted decision trees and neural networks, to these large datasets to detect underlying trends that can drive value to our customers. The Data Science Engineer also needs to be able to coordinate with fellow engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to apply the results of these analytics in a way that makes a positive impact to our customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
pros: ['"Good people, benefits, and a fun place to work" (in 1 reviews)']
cons: ['No Cons have been reported by the Glassdoor community.']

descriptions_txt: ['The B2B Insights & Analytics team exists to drive optimal decision-making that improves our business customers’ FF&E shopping experience through Sales interactions. We seek to optimize Sales incrementality by identifying the most CLV-accretive Sales interactions with customers, as a critical driver of our flywheel. The data we are experts in represents the voice of external customers (e.g. onsite activity, communication with Business accounts, orders, & firmographic data) and internal customers (e.g. onsite activity, communication between Sales representatives & Business accounts, CRM, and Sales Operations data) - we source, interpret and translate that voice into action that serves our customers. This team leads measurement - particularly around causal inference - and also plays a data challenger role to ensure the STO understands the “why” behind great customer experiences. And we partner closely with Data Science - to jointly develop and apply machine learning approaches to drive growth, and Data Solutions/Engineering - to ensure we have a strong, and high-velocity data foundation.\nApplied Data Science - B2B Sales Incrementality Optimization team exists to identify opportunities and provide actionable recommendations based on hard data to grow revenue and improve efficiency. We strive to deliver better understanding of customers and improve the engagement model between Sales and customers.\nWe expect team members and management to take high degree of ownership for their areas of focus, and execute on ideas and deliver results under fast-paced cultures. Beyond a strong academic background, a successful candidate will have experience successfully designing and launching A/B testing, measuring impact for unbalanced or skewed data sets, building models and/or creatively leveraging model outputs to improve the existing Sales program structures or Sales engagement models. We are looking for someone who is a self-starter, who approaches complex business questions with data and curiosity, who dives below the surface to identify the causal relationship rather than just trends, and who works effectively with technical and non-technical cross-functional teams.', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['***This position is for in-office candidates only, no remote candidates will be considered', 'ConsumerDirect, Inc is a SaaS company located in Irvine, CA comprised of fun and creative people building unique and patented technologies for the consumer money, credit & identity space. The company was founded in 2003 with the vision that technology should allow consumers to interact with their banks, creditors and other institutions using a simple button, and we’ve done just that.', 'We are building technology that is disrupting the industry and we’re growing very rapidly, so we are looking for a talented Data Engineer to join our team.', 'As a Data Engineer in our IT department at ConsumerDirect’s Irvine office, you will work in small teams to design and build and maintain innovative data and analytics solutions leveraging Amazon Web Services, cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, and other related technologies like Segment and MySQL. In addition to building the next generation of data platforms, you will be working with a forward-thinking organization in data and analytics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Come join a growing financial technology company that’s leading the marketplace in both the marketing and servicing of credit cards! Continental Finance Company specializes in credit card options for those consumers with less than perfect credit. We are seeking a Data Scientist to support our Data Science team.', "The Data Scientist will be responsible for developing quantitative/analytic models and applications in support of the firm's risk underwriting and marketing effort. This role focuses on the development of models, strategies, and operational guidelines for the organization's various credit card products as they relate to the analysis, tracking, and reporting of various risk metrics. This role requires advanced degree in statistics/probability, physics, applied mathematics or another heavy quantitative discipline. Our Quantitative Analytic staff is focused on and responsible for the development of the theory and mathematics behind various models. This position reports to Chief Data Scientist.", '***CFC offers a hybrid work schedule which includes three (3) core days in the office (Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday) and two (2) remote workdays (Monday and Friday)***', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['General Description for Data Scientist:', 'Responsibilities:', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
descriptions_list: ['We are looking for a developer data scientist to support in identifying, designing and implementing data science & artificial intelligence solutions.', 'The ideal candidate should have exceptional skills in programming machine learning models, as well as knowledge of data science, statistics, machine learning algorithms, and software engineering.', 'Assess machine learning development techniques & algorithms to incorporate into model development cycle', 'Use software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle of Machine Learning models, including coding standards, code reviews, version control management, testing, deployment, and monitoring', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Qualifications', '*EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE\n*', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Data Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics or related field is required. A master’s degree or doctorate degree is highly desired. Six years of progressively responsible experience working in a statistically oriented research field, such as survey research, database analysis or actuarial research. Experience should include creating and optimizing business intelligence datasets and dashboards, quantitative analysis, operations, project management or related fields. Extensive knowledge and application of data analysis software (e.g. R. Stata), data visualization software (e.g. SQL, R, Python, etc.) and conducting advanced data analytics (e.g. Multivariate statistics, network and cluster analysis, forecasting, machine learning and pattern matching). Must be able to work independently and collectively as a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills required. Experience working in a public or transit environment is desired. Directly related work experience may be substituted on a year-for-year basis in-lieu of educational requirement.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['At Density, we build one of the most advanced people sensing systems in the world. The product and infrastructure is nuanced and one-of-a-kind. Building this product for scale has been an exercise in patience, creativity, remarkable engineering, laser physics, global logistics, and grit. The team is thoughtful, driven, and world-class.
We build systems that are real-time, accurate, and anonymous by design. Our systems help today’s largest companies understand how their buildings get used. We have counted hundreds of millions of people.
Counting people in “real-time” is unique and particularly hard to achieve. It allows a user to walk into a room, beneath our sensor, and see the room’s occupancy increment 700ms later.
Today alone, Density will ingest over 1m events. In the coming year, our sensor network is on track to grow ten-fold. The overall system load is exploding. Maintaining our low latency standards requires an increasingly thoughtful system.
We’re architecting infrastructure where annual, unscheduled downtime is measured in minutes. We’re building intelligent redundancies so missed events are an oddity. We’re constructing an exceptional engineering team to support always-on, intelligible analytics generated on the fly.
This role reports to our Director of Data Science & Engineering.
As a at Density, you will work on algorithms developed for applications deployed on state-of-the-art remote devices as well as our cloud platform. The data you will work with includes ToF depth data, point clouds from radar, and device parameters. Algorithms include computer vision segmentation identification, 3D point cloud surface analysis, and optimization algorithms for sensor tuning. Join a team of experienced data scientists as we expand what is possible.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This role is Hybrid***', 'At Asset Based Lending (ABL), we are striving to be the top hard money lenders in the nation. We understand that in order to exceed our goals we need inspired, talented, and driven leaders. This starts with you! If you would like to be a part of the most innovative hard money lenders in the business and have a passion for real estate, you have found the right place.', 'ABL is actively seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Modeler to join our rapidly expanding Accounting and Operations Team. This person will work directly with senior leadership to refine internal processes, develop data model analysis such as, seasonality payoff, draw timeline, commission profitability, etc. This includes but is not limited to the development of a CRM dashboard and cash flow projections.', 'Our NJ lending team is extremely customer centric and is experiencing tremendous growth. The ideal candidate will be driven to learn the real estate and lending business while staying curious, work to consistently elevate their standards, and be comfortable juggling competing priorities. If you have a tireless drive to succeed, and a need for learning while growing personal and organizational success, come join the ABL team!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Company Overview', 'Citi Trends is a high growth, publically held retail brand with a fleet of 585 Stores across 33 States. We are the leading specialty value store for African American and Latinx Families with a rich history of catering to under resourced communities on a path to grow to $1 Billion in sales by 2023. We have delivered consistent positive comparable stores sales increases in fourteen of the last sixteen quarters. Our track record of delivering eight straight years of profitability coupled with no debt allows us to invest in people, systems and infrastructure to scale our business. We carry a world-class assortment of branded and private branded merchandise across apparel, accessories, footwear and home that is showcased in an inviting store environment staffed by friendly associates. The Citi Trends experience works in rural, suburban and urban communities with the potential to grow to 1,000 stores to serve our loyal and expanding customer base. Our long-range plan calls for more than 20% compounded annual growth in both operating income and EPS. We are actively building our team of diverse leaders in a culture filled with passion, collaboration, agility and customer obsession and will continue to uphold our longstanding commitment to diversity and inclusion.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['DataOS is both an organization in Print Software and a big data platform. We are strategically aligned with the HP data strategy to enable and accelerate efficient delivery of business value from big data. Our platform provides the technology enablers, building blocks, operations, and data-as-a-service that power analytic insights across the Print business. We are the System of Record for Print product data, enable combining product and HP Business data, and are leading the evolution of big data technology.', '', 'We are looking for a Software Developer/Data Engineer to join our Big Data development team. If you are passionate about data and technology, we are eager to talk to you. The ideal candidate has both a willingness and desire to work in a dynamic environment, is able to apply Agile methodologies in day to day activities, and is a self-motivated developer who also enjoys working in a team environment. Our team is focused on establishing new cloud based data communication, archival, analysis, and reporting solutions for our consumer and commercial printing business units. Our people have a creative, innovative, fun, and collaborative attitude, and are dedicated to creating new and valuable solutions for HP.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt:
['Lucrative assignment with a leading automotive organization.', 'Do YOU have a passion for working with Data? Do you love working in machine learning, real-time analytics, or Big Data? Interested in learning and utilizing different technologies without limitation? We are looking for a Data Expert that will help our clients evaluate and implement big data and advanced analytics solutions in the Cloud. We are passionate about data, problem solving and driving value to make a difference with our clients.', "Evaluate and analyze the automotive marketplace to identify risks and opportunities for clients
Present team members and clients with analysis supporting decisions related to sales, pricing, and marketing strategy
Proactively assist in determining client needs and help develop new analytical solutions to satisfy those needs
Develop and implement statistical predictive models to help solve various big data problems
Develop and implement optimization models to address business-related challenges
Knowledge in a variety of non-SQL big data open source products such as Spark, EMR/Hadoop etc.
Programming experience, ideally in Python, Scala, Java or R, but we are open to other experience if you're willing to learn the languages we use
Knowledge of natural language processing is a plus
Ability to operate in an agile, entrepreneurial start-up environment
Excellent teamwork skills with an ability to reach out and use team strengths to get the work done with minimal supervision
Good communication skills
You must be motivated, driven, and passionate about programming and technology", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['This job is remote!', "O'Neil Global Advisors (OGA) is an investment advisor that builds algorithmic strategies based on proprietary quantitative factor research pioneered by investing legend William J. O'Neil. Bill's methodology has achieved consistent success over more than five decades, and OGA's strategies provide our clients with an exclusive way to capture the success of his powerful and disciplined approached to investing.We develop strategies that are inspired by Bill's disciplined quantitative approach and incorporate his desire for constant improvement through ongoing backtesting.", '', '', '', '', '']

['At Density, we build one of the most advanced people sensing systems in the world. The product and infrastructure is nuanced and one-of-a-kind. Building this product for scale has been an exercise in patience, creativity, remarkable engineering, laser physics, global logistics, and grit. The team is thoughtful, driven, and world-class.
We build systems that are real-time, accurate, and anonymous by design. Our systems help today’s largest companies understand how their buildings get used. We have counted hundreds of millions of people.
Counting people in “real-time” is unique and particularly hard to achieve. It allows a user to walk into a room, beneath our sensor, and see the room’s occupancy increment 700ms later.
Today alone, Density will ingest over 1m events. In the coming year, our sensor network is on track to grow ten-fold. The overall system load is exploding. Maintaining our low latency standards requires an increasingly thoughtful system.
We’re architecting infrastructure where annual, unscheduled downtime is measured in minutes. We’re building intelligent redundancies so missed events are an oddity. We’re constructing an exceptional engineering team to support always-on, intelligible analytics generated on the fly.
This role reports to our Director of Data Science & Engineering.
As a at Density, you will work on algorithms developed for applications deployed on state-of-the-art remote devices as well as our cloud platform. The data you will work with includes ToF depth data, point clouds from radar, and device parameters. Algorithms include computer vision segmentation identification, 3D point cloud surface analysis, and optimization algorithms for sensor tuning. Join a team of experienced data scientists as we expand what is possible.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['The core goal of Araceli Biosciences is to accelerate drug discovery, by bringing advanced, AI-driven tools to market. We are passionate about our customers success and that drives everything we do. To help our customers accelerate discovery, Araceli Biosciences is looking for an excellent Applications Scientist to join our dynamic product team. Araceli Biosciences delivers high-performance scientific tools for cell-based biomarker discovery, drug discovery and drug development. Araceli is transforming the high content imaging market and is looking for a passionate Applications Scientist to drive the drug discovery revolution.', 'The Applications Scientist is an integral member of the marketing team and is responsible for content generation, assay development, instrument validation, and conducting virtual customer demonstrations. As an Applications Scientist, you will work collaboratively within the marketing group, regularly working with the product management, scientific support, engineering and marketing teams. The Applications Scientist should be comfortable with concepts around artificial intelligence, including but not limited to machine learning and deep learning. Additionally, the applications scientist will help to identify potential scientific collaborations to help further product development, inform company strategy and contribute to the greater scientific field.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

descriptions_txt: ['Company Overview:', 'Headquartered in San Diego, DecisionLogic is a leading FinTech company providing a suite of integrated financial asset verification and credit scoring solutions across major financing verticals.
